results.content: That was too short and too easy.

response.content:
Thank you! I'm new to Udemy and working on the remaining part of the tutorial.
They are easy because most intructors mix all concepts and skip some part of the language and asume you already know something they don't explain.
So ı'm trying to make learning programming fun, easy to learn and practical!
